show_name: Detective Conan: Private Eye in the Distant Sea (movie 17)
other_title: Meitantei Conan: Zekkai no Private Eye (Japanese)
名偵探柯南 絕海的偵探 (Chinese (Taiwan))
名探偵コナン 絶海の探偵（プライベート・アイ） (Japanese)
plot: After winning a prize to a military ship cruise, Conan and the others are left with the task of finding the culprit among them as the security of the whole country rests on their shoulders.
